body.p: In this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter we sound a call for a developer to join the net-dialup team, announce the new gentoo-science mailing list, and also bring you the story of Michael Rayment, a user who decided to put Gentoo on every computer in his house. There's also a security announcement about mod-php, a profile of developer Bryan Stine, a tip about job control, and more. Enjoy!
